com.danielly.jsf.cinema.services.admin

Class HallsAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.services.admin.HallsAdmin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named(value="hall_data")
 @RequestScoped
public class HallsAdmin
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class HallsAdmin provides methods to manage the halls in the GUI interface. It handle the inputs, query the database and notify the user when needed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
